TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ForeignKeyAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: Denotes a property used as a foreign key in a relationship.

span.span: Denotes a property used as a foreign key in a relationship.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註釋可能會放在外部索引鍵屬性上並指定關聯的導覽屬性名稱，或它可能會放在導覽屬性上並指定相關聯的外部索引鍵名稱。The annotation may be placed on the foreign key property and specify the associated navigation property name, or it may be placed on a navigation property and specify the associated foreign key name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

param.name: name
param.span: The name of the associated navigation property, or the name of one or more associated foreign keys.

span.span: The name of the associated navigation property, or the name of one or more associated foreign keys.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您加入`ForeignKey`外部索引鍵的屬性，此屬性`name`應該指定相關聯的導覽屬性的名稱。If you add the `ForeignKey` attribute to a foreign key property, `name` should specify the name of the associated navigation property. 如果您加入`ForeignKey`導覽屬性，此屬性`name`應該指定名稱的其中一個或多個相關聯的外部索引鍵。If you add the `ForeignKey` attribute to a navigation property, `name` should specify the name of one or more associated foreign keys. 如果導覽屬性的多個外部索引鍵，請使用逗號來分隔外部索引鍵名稱的清單。If a navigation property has multiple foreign keys, use commas to separate the list of foreign key names. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Code First 資料註解](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj591583(v=vs.113).aspx)。For more information, see [Code First Data Annotations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj591583(v=vs.113).aspx).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the name of the associated navigation property or of the associated foreign keys.

span.span: Gets the name of the associated navigation property or of the associated foreign keys.

value.span: 相關聯的導覽屬性或相關聯的外部索引鍵的名稱。

span.span: The name of the associated navigation property or of the associated foreign keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`ForeignKey`屬性會套用至外部索引鍵的屬性，`Name`屬性會指定關聯的導覽屬性的名稱。If the `ForeignKey` attribute is applied to a foreign key property, the `Name` property specifies the name of the associated navigation property. 如果`ForeignKey`屬性會套用至一個導覽屬性`Name`屬性會指定其中一或多個相關聯的外部索引鍵。If the `ForeignKey` attribute is applied to a navigation property, the `Name` property specifies the name of one or more associated foreign keys. 如果導覽屬性的多個外部索引鍵，逗號來分隔外部索引鍵名稱的清單。If a navigation property has multiple foreign keys, commas separate the list of foreign key names. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Code First 資料註解](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj591583(v=vs.113).aspx)。For more information, see [Code First Data Annotations](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj591583(v=vs.113).aspx).
